title: 2.4 Master Challenge 2
question: Create a program to move the sprite across the four edges of the stage. The program should run forever and it should only stop when the x key is pressed.

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
